channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- LDAP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- LDAP

item.title: CVE-2017-0166|2024-08-05T12:55:19.232Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- ldap
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Windows when LDAP request buffer lengths are improperly calculated. In a remote attack scenario, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability by running a specially crafted application to send malicious traffic to a Domain Controller, aka "LDAP Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."
